file_content.text: I see you eying your lightsaber, Jedi. A preemptive attack will only make me mad.
I didn't come to Voss for a fight. You know I won't make trouble for the Republic.
And you won't make trouble for the Empire. Or your master cuts off your oxygen.
The ruins here belong to the Sith. I'm within my rights to kill you if you enter.
There's Jedi ruins here too. These turn out to be yours, I'll leave. Peacefully.
